description: State diagram test fixtures extracted from mermaid.js (MIT licensed)

fixtures.name: super_simple
fixtures.input:
stateDiagram-v2
[*] --> State1
State1 --> [*]

fixtures.name: simple_with_description
fixtures.input:
stateDiagram-v2
State1 : this is another string
[*] --> State1
State1 --> [*]

fixtures.name: multiple_states
fixtures.input:
stateDiagram-v2
[*] --> State1
State1 --> [*]
State1 : this is a string
State1 : this is another string
State1 --> State2
State2 --> [*]

fixtures.name: state_as_syntax
fixtures.input:
stateDiagram-v2
state "Small State 1" as namedState1

fixtures.name: state_colon_syntax
fixtures.input:
stateDiagram-v2
namedState1 : Small State 1

fixtures.name: state_colon_no_space
fixtures.input:
stateDiagram-v2
namedState1:Small State 1

stateDiagram-v2
assemble
assemblies

state assemblies

fixtures.name: simple_composite
nested_composite
multiple_composite
composite_with_alias
fixtures.input:
stateDiagram-v2
state "Not Shooting State" as NotShooting {
  state "Idle mode" as Idle
  state "Configuring mode" as Configuring
  [*] --> Idle
  Idle --> Configuring : EvConfig
}

fixtures.name: group_with_named_states
fork_join
fixtures.input:
stateDiagram-v2
state fork_state <<fork>>
[*] --> fork_state
fork_state --> State2
fork_state --> State3
state join_state <<join>>
State2 --> join_state
State3 --> join_state
join_state --> State4
State4 --> [*]

fixtures.name: concurrent_regions
fixtures.input:
stateDiagram-v2
[*] --> Active
state Active {
  [*] --> NumLockOff
  NumLockOff --> NumLockOn : EvNumLockPressed
  NumLockOn --> NumLockOff : EvNumLockPressed
  --
  [*] --> CapsLockOff
  CapsLockOff --> CapsLockOn : EvCapsLockPressed
  CapsLockOn --> CapsLockOff : EvCapsLockPressed
}

fixtures.name: choice_state
fixtures.input:
stateDiagram-v2
state if_state <<choice>>
[*] --> if_state
if_state --> State1 : condition 1
if_state --> State2 : condition 2

stateDiagram-v2
[*] --> State1
State1 --> [H]

fixtures.name: deep_history
fixtures.input:
stateDiagram-v2
[*] --> State1
State1 --> [H*]

fixtures.name: class_def

fixtures.name: full_example
fixtures.input:
stateDiagram-v2
[*] --> State1
State1 --> State2 : Succeeded
State1 --> [*] : Aborted
State2 --> State3 : Succeeded
State2 --> [*] : Aborted
state State3 {
  state "Accumulate Enough Data" as long1
  long1 : Just a test
  [*] --> long1
  long1 --> long1 : New Data
  long1 --> ProcessData : Enough Data
}
State3 --> State3 : Failed
State3 --> [*] : Succeeded / Save Result
State3 --> [*] : Aborted

stateDiagram
